description: Combining the classic look and feel of your favorite worn-in flannel shirt with a modern grid fleece lining to expand its capabilities, the Outpost Long Sleeve Lined Shirt looks the part while providing warm, technical stretch performance whether you're biking in the desert, shredding in the backcountry or kicking it in camp.
name: Mountain Hardwear Outpost LS Lined Shirt - Mens

specs.value: Woven Twill With Grid Fleece Lining
